descriptionHtml:
Northeast along the coast from Dawnstar you\'ll find a captain and his vessel.  He offers you a once in an eternity opportunity to leave Skyrim on a 7 day trip.  Will you take him up on his offer?

READ :  This is more or less a proof of concept at the moment (April 22nd 2012). It is incomplete and THERE IS CURRENTLY NO WAY TO RETURN TO SKYRIM without the help of console codes.  BACK UP YOUR SAVE.

The command to return to skyrim is \"coc PRSkyrimShipPort\"

Pictures coming soon.  Description coming soon. 



Please leave feedback. :)


Walkthrough: 
1. Fast travel to Dawnstar.  Travel North east along the coast. When you\'re near the sanctuary, you should see the captain and his ship off the coast. 
2. Talk to the captain, he brings up a proposition. 
3. Sleep in the bedroll and you\'ll find yourself in the beginning of a new adventure. 

If for whatever reason it doesn\'t work and you want to see the island, open the console and type \"coc PRBeach\"

About the author:
I am a 3rd year university student in the computer science and business program. My hobbies include modding, sports, and working on my car.  

You might find my other project for New Vegas in the top 100 list on Nexus titled \"Run the Lucky 38\".
author: PaladinRider
